member.name: T:IvanAkcheurov.NClassify.KnnMonoCategorizedClassifier`2
member.summary: Finds the most probable label (category) for the item that hasn't been seen before. Given unknown item, finds N the closest known and labeled items. With that information produces the rankings for all labels. Label's rank is calculated as an average distance to its N closest items. Current implementation has N set to infinity.
member.typeparam: known items that have been labeled
